title: Bans the sale, use or possession of 50-caliber weapons
summary: Bans the sale, use or possession of 50-caliber or larger weapons and directs the division of state police to embark on a program whereby persons currently in lawful possession of such weapons may be reimbursed for the fair market value thereof upon turning such weapons in to a designated officer.

       AN ACT to amend the penal law and the  executive  law,  in  relation  to

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-

    1    Section 1. Legislative findings and declaration. The legislature here-
    2  by finds and declares that  50-caliber  or  larger  weapons  having  the

    5  such  an  imminent  threat  and danger to the safety and security of the
    6  people of this state that it is necessary to ban the possession and  use
